name: Evan Bertoncello
text: The buffet was great! They made a no-cheese pizza for one of my relatives who can't eat cheese.

name: Tim Mccalman
text: We really like the Pizza Hut on Rt. 8. They have a lunch buffet and ket you order whatever pizza you want on it. The staff is always very nice and the food is really good.

name: Wayne R
text: This is your standard set up pizza hut restaurant. Staff were nice as pizza was made on time. ‚Ä¶More

text: It was completely terrible. Order for my family was wrong and my niece's order didn't come out until we were leaving. They told us they would give mine and my niece's order free because they were completely wrong BUT we paid full price for ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Lynch
text: We like the salad bar, pizza is always great!  Short-staffed most of the time, but the servers do their best.

name: R Griffin
text: Ordered while at a hotel during a power outage. No lights, no heat. My daughter loves pizza. Evidently, I wasn't clear with my half cheese, half meat pizza order. Arrived 1hr later as scheduled but no pizza had been made. Mistakes happen but, that explanation doesn't fill a stomach.

name: Lawrence Abbey
text: We wanted good easy food. Can't go wrong with pizza hut. The waitress was very nice, the place was clean.

name: Zee Markel
text: We went for the buffet today. We waited over 15 minutes for more Pizza‚Äôs.  By the time we got up to the pizza, they were out again. We had to leave and paid the bill and only got one piece of pizza each. They also was out of Ranch for salads. This was a hot mess today.   We will not be returning for the buffet.

name: Seth Curran
text: Consistently get great pizza and service from this location.  Highly recommended.

name: SlickJames018
text: great place great salad bar buffet n menu options always glad to go here

name: Travis Gabriel
text: Service was well below what is expected, food order was wrong then taken away from us after they noticed. Food was good but it was a long wait to get it and they weren't even busy. Wouldn't recommend

name: Lauralei B
text: Still great sauce, sucks no anchovies

name: C. Davis
text: Do not come here to eat, watered down sauce for breadsticks. I think everyone was high as hell except the older lady who was working everyone's shift. I feel bad but this is the second and last time I will go here. No reason for it whoever owns this Pizza Hut owes me dinner somewhere.

name: Gay Kaltenbaugh
text: Buffet  was suppose to start at 5 on Wed.  At 5:30 they finally put out a pizza. Bread sticks but no sauce. Salad bar great but haven't  seen them refill it. I requested a veggie  Pizza at 5 at 5:50 still haven't seen it. Place is packed, No one happy. Out of here and won't be back!

name: Jake Smith
text: I worked here for a year and have not set foot back in, absolutely awful place to work and eat. Joyce made every day a nightmare and constantly yelled at her staff in front of customers. Mary Ann and Linda are amazing people under a terrible boss

name: Nichole Capriotti
text: Didn't even get to order my pepperoni pizza. Shelia was such a helpful person she hung up on me. I didn't realize that it was such a job to order a pizza. How can someone be so rude. I didn't realize that there were so many options at Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaimee Hoffman
text: Take-out was a mess. Backed up line of customers and very unorganized to say the least. An order that says ready wasnt even cooked. We placed our order ahead of time so it would be ready. 50 mins later it still was incomplete and they didn't know what we were missing.

name: Rick Moses Guitar
text: Not very happy with my service. Ordered supreme pizza and had toppings on only 2 pieces of a large pie. Waitress did not seem to care. What a waste of time and money.
